history.content:
Are you doing research with an faculty member's research group? Or working on a cool project in another department? We would like to invite you to participate in the 2015 Undergraduate Research Symposium on Thursday, May 7, 2015 from 12 noon - 2 pm in the Wozniak lounge. This is a platform for undergraduate researchers at all stages to share their work with the community - everyone is invited to present a poster about their research project. There will be a raffle for all poster presenters - this is your chance to win an Xbox (Thank you Microsoft Research!)

 

The poster session is open to everyone - tell your friends and come check out the posters. It is a great way to find a research project and get involved in research as well. Lunch will be provided!

 

If you've never made a poster before - don't worry. We will provide poster templates as well as feedback on your posters. We can even help with getting posters printed as necessary.

 

Sign up by Monday Apr 27 to participate. Everyone is welcome.

 

https://docs.google.com/a/berkeley.edu/forms/d/1YPuOJX2ULizjPB9vLioWaVnaX8ULm1RczrZz_4povMc/viewform

 

Questions? Concerns? Intrigued, but not sure? Email me at gireeja@eecs.berkeley.edu

 

Thanks to the Semiconductor Research Corporation and the EECS department for funding support.

 

Cheers,

Gireeja
history.subject: Undergraduate Research Symposium on Thursday, May 7 - FREE LUNCH
